meanings.definition: slattings: plural noun - thin strips of wood or other material used for covering a surface
meanings.sent1: The slattings on the wall were made of light wood.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter installed the slattings on the ceiling.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the slattings on the fence.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a jumble of thoughts, like a room with slattings in disarray.
meanings.sent5: The slattings cast interesting shadows on the floor.

meanings.definition: slattings: verb - to cover or decorate with slats or thin strips of material
meanings.sent1: She carefully slattings the table with colorful strips of paper.
meanings.sent2: The decorator slattings the window frames with elegant wooden slats.
meanings.sent3: He decided to slattings his bike helmet with stickers.
meanings.sent4: The artist slattings the canvas with bold strokes of paint.
meanings.sent5: The chef slattings the cake with layers of frosting.
